#summary Development Timeline

This page is geared towards developers and power-users. For general coverage of releases, see the ArbotixReleases page.

= Improvement and Developments Outline =

 * Release 1.1 (Late Fall)
   * new libraries: Encoders - <font color="#FF0000">_in progress_</font>
   * new examples: a rover with closed loop feedback
   * PyPose Improvements: (V1.1)
     # First version of NUKE - the Nearly Universal Kinematics Engine - <font color="#FF0000">_in progress_</font>
     # Servo limits capture dialog - <font color="#FF0000">_in progress_</font>
     # New Port Open dialog, with selection of driver. This also requires the driver model to be updated a bit.
 * Release 1.0b (Early November)
    * PyPose Improvements:
     # Delta-T during Pose Editor set - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
     # Port drivers merged, this moves us towards better support
    * Release format:
     # Split into two releases: arbotix-software (includes all Arduino patches, BioloidController & Motors2 libraries, and PyPose), and robocontrollerLib (includes other libraries related to robocontrollers in general)

= Revision History =

 * Version 1.0a (10-18-09, r329)
   * Port detection overhauled for MacOSX users. 
   * Port errors are actually now detected (arbotix.py pushes errors higher).
   * Fixed blank transition error.
   * Fixed timeout issues. 

 * Release Candidate 1a (10/17/09)
   * Fixed save/load bug

 * Release Candidate 1 (10/2/09)
   * Fixed error messages in multiple places, cleaned up portions of code
   * Repaired new project dialog. 

 * Beta 4a Release (9/28/09) 
   * updated libraries: pypose (for PyPose V0.97) was made much faster
   * PyPose Improvements: (V0.97)

     # Fixed various issues with dialogs and borders under Windows - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>

     # Added first pass of Terminal tool - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
     # Key shortcuts for pose operations - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
     # Dialog added to change pose names - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
     # Improved port management and error messages - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
     # Selection of serial ports (rather than having to enter them) - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
     # Includes all files we used to pull from Sanguino - <font color="#009933">_done_</font>
   * Updated examples:
     # droid (now includes droid.ppr)
